predicate.note: Frames file for 'counter' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. No comparison.

example.name: just prompting of action
example.text: But LTV's move marks the first effort by a major steelmaker *trace* to counter the free fall in spot prices.
example.arg: the free fall in spot prices

example.name: with reaction
example.text: John countered Mary's intelligent objection to his ideas with a screaming tantrum.
example.arg: Mary's intelligent objection to his ideas
